properties.address: Borth Community Hub, Clarach Rd, Borth SY245LW
properties.description: A Community Space where we usually also run a pay as you feel cafe from 11.30 to 13.30 . We serve a variety of warming home cooked foods . We also run a number of activities throughout the day which vary from week to week. Please see our Facebook page for updates .
properties.title: Borth Community Hub

properties.description: A community centre near the town library and cinema open 10.30 - 14.00 on Tuesdays and Thursdays offering hot meal (pay-as-you-feel) 12.15-13.15 and boardgames on Friday evenings (19.00-21.00).
properties.title: St Paul's Methodist Centre
